name: Curve WETH Single Sided Strategy
description: Supplies {{token}} to the liquidity pool on [Curve Finance](https://curve.fi/seth/deposit) to obtain [eCRV](https://etherscan.io/address/0xA3D87FffcE63B53E0d54fAa1cc983B7eB0b74A9c) tokens which it then puts into the v2 Curve sETH Pool yVault ([yveCRV](https://etherscan.io/address/0x986b4AFF588a109c09B50A03f42E4110E29D353F)) to gain yield.
